text: Philip Baine Austin (April 6, 1941 â€“ June 18, 2015) was an American comedian and writer. Austin was best known for his work as part of The Firesign Theatre (of which he was the only constant member), where he played the group's best- known creation, Nick Danger. ==Other websites== * Phil Austin's Blog of the Unknown * Austin's bio on Firesign Theatre site * Phil Austin: The Man Under The Hat * Phil Austin on IMDB Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Comedians from Denver Category:Writers from Denver
title: Phil Austin
